name: rotating-file-stream
description: Opens a stream.Writable to a file rotated by interval and/or size. A logrotate alternative.

scripts.test:
echo '.jshintrc
.gitignore
.travis.yml
test' > .npmignore ; cat .gitignore >> .npmignore
  ./node_modules/.bin/jshint index.js test || exit 1
  ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- --recursive test

author: Daniele Ricci <daniele.icc@gmail.com> (https://github.com/iccicci)
